channel.title: ElitePk V6! NO MORE HAMACHI! New armour + Npcs
channel.description:
Server is up and running! 24/7 server. Lots of fun and new things to do and see. Come to the forums and check us out, download the client and play today!
When you connect to our network, connect to "ElitePkRSC" Changed the network name, there was way to much confusion. Once you are connected to our network you are ready to go :)
HUGE UPDATE TODAY!
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/Training.jpg[/img]
- training area, just type ::train
Also, Some more new NPC's. Here's one, many, many more :)
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/Dragon.jpg[/img]
Drops Elite Armour (green), and intensity ammy!
This is my favorite, and as far as i know, no other server has done this to date. New NPC with New armour, i know, i know. New armour, what's so special about it? We haven't decided an official name for it, for now we are calling it "hallow" Armour, (i was told this name has been used before, that's the main reason it is being changed) The new and best thing about this new armour is you can change the color to whatever your little hearth desires. Take 3k, and you can change it to basically any color you chose. Why is this so special. First off, it is only weildable for those of you that get to flats (140's down the board) Also, it can help distinguish clans, and give you a little bit of fun while running through the RS world. If you work hard for your stats you should enjoy the armour you wear :). All of them have the same stat, which is a little bit better than elite, which is weildable at 130. Only one monster in game drops it, and at a very low rate i might add. So it won't be easy to obtain.
Heres the monster
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/Demon.jpg[/img]
and here is a few of the colors you can chose from, you can also change your color at any time (when outside the wilderness)
[IMG]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/Armour.jpg[/img]
Say you like steel armour, but it just doesn't meet your defense requirements for pking. Well boom, you can have it at no loss of AL. It comes in a variety of colors, you chose :)
Hope to see you all at ElitePK!
NEW FORUM!! Check sig!
[img]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/NewNpc.jpg[/img]
New NPC's
[img]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/new.jpg[/img]
New Armour and Weapons
Level cap has changed from 99 to 140.
The experience rate is pretty high. around 1000x right now, It will give players something to day, that way we don't have millions of maxed accounts running around saying how bored they are.
Check the sig for forum, Everything is explained. Come give it a shot today :) tell someone i sent you, get a free 2h :)
